description: Here we'll learn how to configure the primary key in our entity class using the `@Id` annotation.
title: Primary Keys

lessons.title: hbm2ddl Configuration and Name Annotations
lessons.description: In this tutorial, we'll look at the schema generation options in Hibernate. We'll also learn some annotations to change the default name generated by Hibernate for entities.

lessons.title: More Annotations
lessons.description: We'll try out a few more annotations to configure our entity class.

lessons.title: Retrieving Objects using session
lessons.description: We'll look at one of the several ways we can fetch data from the database using Hibernate: the `session.get` method.

lessons.title: Primary Keys
lessons.description: Here we'll learn how to configure the primary key in our entity class using the `@Id` annotation.

lessons.title: Value Types and Embedding Objects
lessons.description: We'll learn the difference between Entity type objects and Value type objects. We'll use the `@Embeddable` annotation to embed a value type object into our Entity class.

lessons.title: AttributeOverrides and Embedded Object Keys
lessons.description: In this video, we'll learn how to override configuration inside embedded objects, and we'll also explore object keys.
